note: I have 30+ years of scholarly publishing experience including product development, software design, content acquisition, international client management, organization building and business development. I have an in-depth understanding of the publishing process particularly related to scientific journals and scholarly communications, professional textbooks, social media, educational programing, bibliographic databases and workflow systems development.
